metadata.name: HackTool - PPID Spoofing SelectMyParent Tool Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of parent process ID spoofing tools like Didier Stevens tool SelectMyParent

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\selectmyparent.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ppid-spoof')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ppid_spoof')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('spoof-ppid')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('spoof_ppid')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ppidspoof')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('spoofppid')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('spoofedppid')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -spawnto '))) AND (contains(lower(process.file.name), lower('ppid-spoof')) OR contains(lower(process.file.name), lower('ppid_spoof')) OR contains(lower(process.file.name), lower('spoof-ppid')) OR contains(lower(process.file.name), lower('spoof_ppid')) OR contains(lower(process.file.name), lower('ppidspoof')) OR contains(lower(process.file.name), lower('spoofppid')) OR contains(lower(process.file.name), lower('spoofedppid'))) AND lower(device.desc) = lower('selectmyparent') AND (contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=04d974875bd225f00902b4cad9af3fbc')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=a782af154c9e743ddf3f3eb2b8f3d16e')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=89059503d7fbf470e68f7e63313da3ad')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=ca28337632625c8281ab8a130b3d6bad'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of parent process ID spoofing tools like Didier Stevens tool SelectMyParent
